010package imagingbook.pub.corners;
011
012import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.Collections;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
019import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
020import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.GaussianKernel1D;
021import imagingbook.lib.ij.Filter;
022import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageMath;
023import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.SubpixelMaxInterpolator;
024import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Method;
025
026/**
027 * Abstract super class for all corner detectors based on local 
028 * structure tensor.
029 * This is the superclass for various concrete implementations:
030 * {@link HarrisCornerDetector},
031 * {@link ShiTomasiDetector},
032 * {@link MopsCornerDetector}.
033 * 
034 * TODO: replace 'border' by ROI rectangle
035 * 
036 * @author W. Burger
037 * @version 2020/10/04
038 */
039public abstract class GradientCornerDetector_OLD {
040        
041        /** For testing/example calculations only! */
042        public static boolean RETAIN_TEMPORARY_DATA = false;
043        
044        public static class Parameters {
045                /** Set true to perform pre-filtering on the input image (before gradient calc.) */
046                public boolean doPreFilter = true;
047                /** Sigma of Gaussian filter used for smoothing gradient maps */
048                public double sigma = 1.275;
049                /** Width of border region ignored in corner search */
050                public int border = 20;
051                /** Set true to perform final corner cleanup */
052                public boolean doCleanUp = true;
053                /** Min. distance between final corners */
054                public double dmin = 10;
055                /** If/how to perform subpixel localization */
056                public Method maxLocatorMethod = Method.None;
057                /** Corner response threshold */
058                public double scoreThreshold = Double.NaN;
059        }
060        
061        protected static final float UndefinedScoreValue = 0;   // to be returned when corner score is undefined
062        
063        //filter kernels (one-dim. part of separable 2D filters)
064        private final static float[] hp = {2f/9, 5f/9, 2f/9};           // pre-smoothing filter kernel
065        private final static float[] hd = {0.5f, 0, -0.5f};                     // first-derivative kernel
066//      private final static float[] hb = {1f/64, 6f/64, 15f/64, 20f/64, 15f/64, 6f/64, 1f/64}; // original gradient blur filter kernel
067        
068        protected final int M, N;
069        protected final Parameters params;
070        protected final FloatProcessor Q;
071        
072        private final SubpixelMaxInterpolator maxLocator;
073        private final List<Corner> corners;
074        
075        // retained mainly for debugging
076        private FloatProcessor A = null;
077        private FloatProcessor B = null;
078        private FloatProcessor C = null;
079        
080        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
081        
082        protected GradientCornerDetector_OLD(ImageProcessor ip, Parameters params) {
083                this.M = ip.getWidth();
084                this.N = ip.getHeight();
085                this.params = params;
086                this.maxLocator = (params.maxLocatorMethod == Method.None) ? null : 
087                        SubpixelMaxInterpolator.getInstance(params.maxLocatorMethod);
088                this.Q = makeCornerScores(ip);
089                this.corners = makeCorners();
090        }
091        
092        /**
093         * Calculates the corner response score for a single image position (u,v)
094         * from the elements A, B, C of the local structure matrix.
095         * To be implemented by concrete sub-classes.
096         * @see HarrisCornerDetector
097         * @see ShiTomasiDetector
098         * @param A = Ixx(u,v)
099         * @param B = Iyy(u,v)
100         * @param C = Ixy(u,v)
101         * @return the corner score
102         */
103        protected abstract float getCornerScore(float A, float B, float C);
104        
105        // -------------------------------------------------------------
106        
107        private FloatProcessor makeCornerScores(ImageProcessor I) {
108                FloatProcessor Ix = I.convertToFloatProcessor(); 
109                FloatProcessor Iy = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
110                
111                // nothing really but a Sobel-like gradient:
112                if (params.doPreFilter) {
113                        Filter.convolveY(Ix, hp);                       // pre-filter Ix vertically
114                        Filter.convolveX(Iy, hp);                       // Pare-filter Iy horizontally
115//                      Ix.convolve(hp, hp.length, 1);                  // pre-filter Ix vertically
116//                      Iy.convolve(hp, 1, hp.length);                  // Pare-filter Iy horizontally
117                }
118                
119                Filter.convolveX(Ix, hd);                               // get first derivative in x
120                Filter.convolveY(Iy, hd);                               // get first derivative in y
121//              Ix.convolve(hd, hd.length, 1);
122//              Ix.convolve(hd, 1, hd.length);
123                
124                // gradient products:
125                A = ImageMath.sqr(Ix);                          // A(u,v) = Ixx(u,v) = (Ix(u,v))^2
126                B = ImageMath.sqr(Iy);                          // B(u,v) = Iyy(u,v) = (Iy(u,v))^2
127                C = ImageMath.mult(Ix, Iy);                     // C(u,v) = Ixy(u,v) = Ix(u,v)*Iy(u,v)
128                
129                // blur the gradient components with a small Gaussian:
130                
131                float[] hb = GaussianKernel1D.makeGaussKernel1D(params.sigma);
132                Filter.convolveXY(A, hb);       // TODO: change to use 'GaussianFilterSeparable'
133                Filter.convolveXY(B, hb);
134                Filter.convolveXY(C, hb);
135                
136                FloatProcessor Q = new FloatProcessor(M, N);
137                
138                final float[] pA = (float[]) A.getPixels();
139                final float[] pB = (float[]) B.getPixels();
140                final float[] pC = (float[]) C.getPixels();
141                final float[] pQ = (float[]) Q.getPixels();
142                
143                for (int i = 0; i < M * N; i++) {
144                        pQ[i] = getCornerScore(pA[i], pB[i], pC[i]);
145                }
146                
147//              (new ImagePlus("Ixx", Ixx)).show();
148//              (new ImagePlus("Iyy", Iyy)).show();
149//              (new ImagePlus("Ixy", Ixy)).show();
150//              (new ImagePlus("Q", Q)).show();
151                
152                return Q;
153        }
154        
155
156        /**
157         * Returns the corner score function as a {@link FloatProcessor} object.
158         * @return the score function
159         */
160        public FloatProcessor getQ() {
161                return this.Q;
162        }
163        
164        public FloatProcessor getA() {
165                return this.A;
166        }
167        
168        public FloatProcessor getB() {
169                return this.B;
170        }
171        
172        public FloatProcessor getC() {
173                return this.C;
174        }
175        
176        public List<Corner> getCorners() {      
177                return Collections.unmodifiableList(corners);
178        }
179        
180        // ----------------------------------------------------------
181        
182        /*
183         * Returned samples are arranged as follows:
184         *      s4 s3 s2
185         *  s5 s0 s1
186         *  s6 s7 s8
187         */
188        private float[] getNeighborhood(FloatProcessor Q, int u, int v) {
189                if (u <= 0 || u >= M - 1 || v <= 0 || v >= N - 1) {
190                        return null;
191                } 
192                else {
193                        final float[] q = (float[]) Q.getPixels();
194                        float[] s = new float[9];
195                        final int i0 = (v - 1) * M + u;
196                        final int i1 = v * M + u;
197                        final int i2 = (v + 1) * M + u;
198                        s[0] = q[i1];
199                        s[1] = q[i1 + 1];
200                        s[2] = q[i0 + 1];
201                        s[3] = q[i0];
202                        s[4] = q[i0 - 1];
203                        s[5] = q[i1 - 1];
204                        s[6] = q[i2 - 1];
205                        s[7] = q[i2];
206                        s[8] = q[i2 + 1];
207                        return s;
208                }
209        }
210        
211        private boolean isLocalMax(float[] s) {
212                if (s == null) {
213                        return false;
214                }
215                else {
216                        final float s0 = s[0];
217                        return  // check 8 neighbors of q0
218                                        s0 > s[4] && s0 > s[3] && s0 > s[2] &&
219                                        s0 > s[5] &&              s0 > s[1] && 
220                                        s0 > s[6] && s0 > s[7] && s0 > s[8] ;
221                }
222        }
223        
224        private List<Corner> makeCorners() {    
225                List<Corner> cl = collectCorners();
226                if (params.doCleanUp) {
227                        cl = cleanupCorners(cl);
228                }
229                return cl;
230        }
231        
232        private List<Corner> collectCorners() {
233                final float th = (float) params.scoreThreshold;
234                final int border = params.border;
235                List<Corner> C = new ArrayList<>();
236                for (int v = border; v < N - border; v++) {
237                        for (int u = border; u < M - border; u++) {
238                                float[] qn = getNeighborhood(Q, u, v);
239                                if (qn != null && qn[0] > th && isLocalMax(qn)) {
240                                        Corner c = makeCorner(u, v, qn);
241                                        if (c != null) {
242                                                C.add(c);
243                                        }
244                                }
245                        }
246                }
247                return C;
248        }
249        
250        private List<Corner> cleanupCorners(List<Corner> C) {
251                final double dmin2 = sqr(params.dmin);
252                // sort corners by descending q-value:
253                Collections.sort(C);
254                // we use an array of corners for efficiency reasons:
255                Corner[] Ca = C.toArray(new Corner[C.size()]);
256                List<Corner> Cclean = new ArrayList<>(C.size());
257                for (int i = 0; i < Ca.length; i++) {
258                        Corner c0 = Ca[i];              // get next strongest corner
259                        if (c0 != null) {
260                                Cclean.add(c0);
261                                // delete all remaining corners cj too close to c0:
262                                for (int j = i + 1; j < Ca.length; j++) {
263                                        Corner cj = Ca[j];
264                                        if (cj != null && c0.distanceSq(cj) < dmin2)
265                                                Ca[j] = null;   //delete corner cj from C
266                                }
267                        }
268                }
269                return Cclean;
270        }
271        
272        /**
273         * Creates a new {@link Corner} instance. Performs sub-pixel
274         * position refinement if a {@link #maxLocator} is defined.
275         * @param u the corner's horizontal position (int)
276         * @param v the corner's vertical position (int)
277         * @param qn the corner scores in the 3x3 neighborhood
278         * @return a new {@link Corner} instance
279         */
280        private Corner makeCorner(int u, int v, float[] qn) {
281                if (maxLocator == null) {
282                        // no sub-pixel refinement, use original integer coordinates
283                        return new Corner(u, v, qn[0]);
284                }
285                else {
286                        // do sub-pixel refinement
287                        float[] xyz = maxLocator.getMax(qn);
288                        return (xyz == null) ? null : new Corner(u + xyz[0], v + xyz[1], xyz[2]);
289                }
290        }
291        
292}
